titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Rebecca West note, 16 August 1931 RL.11402
titlestmt.author: Megan E. Lewis

publicationstmt.publisher: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2017-03-10 16:36:56 -0500.

repository.corpname: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library

did.abstract: Rebecca West was a British writer and critic. The Rebecca West note consists of a single autograph manuscript note to an unknown correspondent reading, "With Miss Rebecca West's compliments." On letterhead stationery: 15, Orchard Court. Portman Square.W.1., Welbeck 3606.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Rebecca West was a prominent British writer and literary critic who published in many genres, including fiction, non-fiction, social and cultural criticism, biography, and journalism. She worked on behalf of the suffrage movement, and had a reputation as a spokeswoman for feminist and socialist causes. West traveled extensively and befriended many literary and political figures of her day. She had a son with the writer H.G. Wells. West was created a Dame Commander of the Order of the British Empire.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Researchers must register and agree to copyright and privacy laws before using this collection.
All or portions of this collection may be housed off-site in Duke University's Library Service Center. The library may require up to 48 hours to retrieve these materials for research use.
Please contact Research Services staff before visiting the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library to use this collection.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: The copyright interests in this collection have not been transferred to Duke University. For more information, consult the copyright section of the Regulations and Procedures of the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library.

acqinfo.head: Provenance
acqinfo.p: The Rebecca West note was received by the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library as a purchase in 2015.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Rebecca West note, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Processed by Megan E. Lewis, March, 2017
Accessions described in this collection guide: 2015-0050-LUBMSS503

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of a single autograph manuscript note to an unknown recipient which reads, "With Miss Rebecca West's compliments." On letterhead stationery: 15, Orchard Court. Portman Square.W.1., Welbeck 3606.
